dataSet.name: DataSet1

v8:item.v8:content: Debt balance as of the start
Debt balance as of the end
Debt balance as of the end (cur.)
Debt balance as of the start (cur.)

dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Recorder END AS Recorder, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SecondPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.MinutePeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.HourPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.DayPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.WeekPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.YearPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Company, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Counterparty, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Contract, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Document, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Order, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Contract.SettlementsCurrency AS Currency, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountOpeningBalanceDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountOpeningBalanceAdvance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountOpeningBalanceSettlements, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountClosingBalanceDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountClosingBalanceAdvance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountClosingBalanceSettlements, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountReceipt ELSE 0 END AS AmountReceiptDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountReceipt ELSE 0 END AS AmountReceiptAdvance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountTurnover ELSE 0 END AS AmountTurnoverDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountTurnover ELSE 0 END AS AmountAdvanceTurnover, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountExpense ELSE 0 END AS AmountExpenseDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountExpense ELSE 0 END AS AmountExpenseAdvance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurOpeningBalanceDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurOpeningBalanceAdvance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurOpeningBalanceSettlements, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurClosingBalanceDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurClosingBalanceAdvance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurClosingBalanceCalculations, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurTurnover ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurTurnoverDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurTurnover ELSE 0 END AS CurAmountTurnoverAdvance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurReceipt ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurReceiptDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurReceipt ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurReceiptPrepayment, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurExpense ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurExpenseDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurExpense ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurExpenseAdvance FROM AccumulationRegister.AccountsReceivable.BalanceAndTurnovers(, , Auto, , ) AS AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers

v8:item.v8:content: Balance of settlements with customers (man. cur.)
Остатки по расчетам с покупателями (упр. вал.)
